properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sarva janulaaraa chappatlu kotti paadudi Jayaarbhaatamu Yehovaanu goorchi cheyudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovaa mahonnatha maina bhayankarudu Maharaajai yunnaadu sakala jagamunaku{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}janamula nehovaa manaku loparchunu janula Mana kaalla krinda anaga drokkunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thana priya yaakobuku mahaathi shayamuga Manaku swaastymunu erpaatu chesenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devudaarbhaatamutho naarohana maayenu Boora dwanitho Yehovaarohana maayenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mana devuni keertinchudi keertinchudi Mana raajunu keertinchudi keertinchudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Raajai yunnaadu Yehovaa ee sarva bhoomiki Ramyamugaa sankeertanalu meeru paadudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devudu annya janulaku raajai yunnaadu Parishudda simhaasanaaseenudai yunnaadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Janula pradhanu labrhaamu devuniki Janulai yekamuga koodukoni yunnaaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mahonnathudu aayenu Yehovaa devudu Manamu vesikonu kedemulu thanavi{/lang-eng}
